item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Yambar Yambar
item.description:
@Yambar wrote:

Your cache link is dead, or make a mapconfig.txt

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:465508”]If you knew this was a Client-sided error, why would you post it in the Server Help section?

I’m tired of trying to help newbies fix their P.I. Bases. Post the contents of the Batch file you’re running it with. Alternatively try executing it with an I.D.E. It either isn’t finding the path correctly, doesn’t exist, or is as the error reads.[/quote]

FileInputStream can’t find \mapConfig.txt. either create a directory or put \mapConfig.txt into the original one.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

If you knew this was a Client-sided error, why would you post it in the Server Help section?

I’m tired of trying to help newbies fix their P.I. Bases. Post the contents of the Batch file you’re running it with. Alternatively try executing it with an I.D.E. It either isn’t finding the path correctly, doesn’t exist, or is as the error reads.

Read full topic
